section.title: Using Dear ImGui Bundle with jupyter notebook
section.simpara: ImmApp adds support for integration inside jupyter notebook: the application will be run in an external window, and a screenshot will be placed on the notebook after execution.
This requires a window server, and will not run on google collab.
Below is a screenshot, that you can test by running jupyter notebook inside bindings/imgui_bundle/demos_python/notebooks
